args: const assert = require('assert'); assert.strictEqual(1 + 1, 2, 'Strict equality'); assert.deepEqual([1, 2], [1, 2], 'Deep equality'); assert.ok(true, 'Truthy check'); assert.throws(() => { throw new Error('test'); }, Error, 'Exception thrown'); console.log('All assertions passed');
